name: TechUKSkills.com
slogan: UK Startup Jobs and Tech Skills Matchmaker
description:
We offer intuitive online job listing for startups and easy tags & location based searching for job seekers. we also suport latest job notifications and a concierge service to do the hardwork involved in search and applications on your behalf.

If you are a job seeker then we pitch your profile to exciting and promising startups using our excellent pitching skills. If you are a cool startup, we contact the coding ninjas registered on our platform and pitch your awesomeness on your behalf.  

If you are a startup looking for interns or a fresh grad looking for internships then we provide you all the support and features of techukskills via our partner portal UKinterns.com dedicted to find match interns with startups.

team.name: Navin Arora
team.bioHtml: Founder of @Appsjunction Meetup , TechUKSkills.com, UKinterns.com. Mentor to Startups, Product & Strategy Head. Also travel, food, movie buff.

jobs.title: TechUKSkills.com & UKInterns.com - Social Media & Events Intern (Paid)
jobs.description:
We built TechUKSkills.com & UKInterns.com to solve the matchmaking need of UK startups, tech ninjas, social media and digital marketing interns. We offer real world tech job fairs, meetup events, personalised concierge service and a very intuitive, easy to use portal to help both sides find each other.  We offer handsome 33% commission on every concierge service signup that the intern secures from his/her own efforts.

As a TechUKSkills.com & UKInterns.com Ambassador you wil be the face of TechUKSkills.com both online and at networking events. You’re the one that our audience will meet at the door of our tech job fair events and will help our audience discover our platform, as well as managing the concierge service we have on offer.  This job will train you to think and work like a Online Marketing Expert and can help you become a co-founder of your own startup some-day. 

Your responsibilities will include…
Organising and Managing Tech Job Fair events
Contacting candidates and employers via other online platforms and making them excited to use TechUKSkills 
Attending tech meetup events as a TechUKSkills representative and signing up candidates as well as employers for our Concierge Service
Managing our social media channels, spreading the word of mouth, running contests and campaigns with rewards.
Managing customer support issues and making sure our audience is always super happy with our service.
Getting stuck in, to hustle around a problem to find the best result for the audience.

Role Requirements...
Excellent communication (both written & oral) skills
Highly organised, motivated and outgoing
Knowledge and love for tech startups
Adept at writing intelligent emails to convert leads into paying clients
Ability to work independently and within a team
Previous experience working in events, online marketing and customer service is preferable
Benefits
It’s a Paid Intern role as in your travel, lunch, mobile & internet use costs will be paid by us. We have a budget of £550 pcm to cover your miscellaneous expenses for this role and you can claim it all if you are performing good. Plus you should ideally aim to earn minimum £500 per month from commissions on securing concierge service orders from both employers and candidates. If you are good then you can easily make £1100 pcm in this role

As a TechUKSkills.com & UKInterns.com Ambassador you’ll be working with a team of highly motivated and experienced co-founders with insight and knowledge at your disposal. As TechUKSkills.com continues to expand, there will be opportunity for your career to grow with us as full time roles are created. You’ll also get to work in an environment that thrives on socialising, networking and attending fascinating tech startup events in London
